attributes.action: place a tank outside parliment for each country we have troops in.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's forget thet we are at war. Instead of working out a way to obtain peace they are working on silly schemes like ID cards which will have only a minor impact on life. If we place a number of tanks outside parliment, then each MP should be regularly reminded and may remain focussed on important issues.
